title: Increase on honor.
body: Been at honor lvl 5 for a couple of months any chance of increasing levels or giving out extras for consistently  being at the top honor lvl ? just another incentive for further stuff is all .

replies.body: 5 is currently the max, congrats!  I believe honor will be reset on the new season, so you'll have an opportunity to go at it again.

Is it a soft or hard reset? It would feel pretty bad to be locked out of capsules without having done anything. (especially since quite a few of us never got capsules untill the recent "bad luck" protection).
will honor be reset for those who are dishonorable at the end of season?
Undetermined, I haven't heard anything specific with that yet.  We'll likely get more details as we draw closer to a new season.
